#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
inline int scan(){
    char c = getchar_unlocked();
    int x = 0;
    while(c<'0'||c>'9'){
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9'){
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return x;
}
int main(){
    int t=scan();
    while(t--){
        char a[1000001]={NULL};
        scanf("%s",a);
        long long lcount=0;
        long long olcount=0;
        long long answer=0;
        int n=strlen(a);
        for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--){
            if(a[i]=='L'){
                lcount++;
                answer+=olcount;
            }
            else{
                olcount+=lcount;
            }
        }
        printf("%lld\n",answer);
    }
}
